.. Document meta

:orphan:

.. Anchors

.. _ansible_collections.opentelekomcloud.cloud.as_group_module:

.. Anchors: short name for ansible.builtin

.. Anchors: aliases



.. Title

opentelekomcloud.cloud.as_group -- Create/Remove AutoScaling group from the OTC
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

.. Collection note

.. note::
    This plugin is part of the `opentelekomcloud.cloud collection <https://galaxy.ansible.com/opentelekomcloud/cloud>`_ (version 0.0.1).

    To install it use: :code:`ansible-galaxy collection install opentelekomcloud.cloud`.

    To use it in a playbook, specify: :code:`opentelekomcloud.cloud.as_group`.

.. version_added

.. versionadded:: 0.2.0 of opentelekomcloud.cloud

.. contents::
   :local:
   :depth: 1

.. Deprecated


Synopsis
--------

.. Description

- Create/Remove AutoScaling group from the OTC.


.. Aliases


.. Requirements

Requirements
------------
The below requirements are needed on the host that executes this module.

- openstacksdk
- openstacksdk >= 0.36.0
- otcextensions
- python >= 3.6


.. Options

Parameters
----------

.. raw:: html

    <table  border=0 cellpadding=0 class="documentation-table">
        <tr>
            <th colspan="2">Parameter</th>
            <th>Choices/<font color="blue">Defaults</font></th>
                        <th width="100%">Comments</th>
        </tr>
                    <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-api_timeout"></div>
                    <b>api_timeout</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-api_timeout" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>How long should the socket layer wait before timing out for API calls. If this is omitted, nothing will be passed to the requests library.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-auth"></div>
                    <b>auth</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-auth" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">dictionary</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Dictionary containing auth information as needed by the cloud&#x27;s auth plugin strategy. For the default <em>password</em> plugin, this would contain <em>auth_url</em>, <em>username</em>, <em>password</em>, <em>project_name</em> and any information about domains (for example, <em>os_user_domain_name</em> or <em>os_project_domain_name</em>) if the cloud supports them. For other plugins, this param will need to contain whatever parameters that auth plugin requires. This parameter is not needed if a named cloud is provided or OpenStack OS_* environment variables are present.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-auth_type"></div>
                    <b>auth_type</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-auth_type" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Name of the auth plugin to use. If the cloud uses something other than password authentication, the name of the plugin should be indicated here and the contents of the <em>auth</em> parameter should be updated accordingly.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-available_zones"></div>
                    <b>available_zones</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-available_zones" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                         / <span style="color: purple">elements=string</span>                                            </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the AZ information. The ECS associated with a scaling action will be created in a specified AZ.       If you do not specify an AZ, the system automatically specifies one.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-ca_cert"></div>
                    <b>ca_cert</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-ca_cert" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>A path to a CA Cert bundle that can be used as part of verifying SSL API requests.</div>
                                                                <div style="font-size: small; color: darkgreen"><br/>aliases: cacert</div>
                                    </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-client_cert"></div>
                    <b>client_cert</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-client_cert" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>A path to a client certificate to use as part of the SSL transaction.</div>
                                                                <div style="font-size: small; color: darkgreen"><br/>aliases: cert</div>
                                    </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-client_key"></div>
                    <b>client_key</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-client_key" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>A path to a client key to use as part of the SSL transaction.</div>
                                                                <div style="font-size: small; color: darkgreen"><br/>aliases: key</div>
                                    </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-cloud"></div>
                    <b>cloud</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-cloud" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">raw</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Named cloud or cloud config to operate against. If <em>cloud</em> is a string, it references a named cloud config as defined in an OpenStack clouds.yaml file. Provides default values for <em>auth</em> and <em>auth_type</em>. This parameter is not needed if <em>auth</em> is provided or if OpenStack OS_* environment variables are present. If <em>cloud</em> is a dict, it contains a complete cloud configuration like would be in a section of clouds.yaml.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-cool_down_time"></div>
                    <b>cool_down_time</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-cool_down_time" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the cooldown period (in seconds). The value ranges from 0 to 86400 and is 300 by default.</div>
                                            <div>After a scaling action is triggered, the system starts the cooldown period. During the cooldown period,       scaling actions triggered by alarms will be denied. Scheduled, periodic,        and manual scaling actions are not affected.</div>
                                            <div>Default is 300.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-delete_publicip"></div>
                    <b>delete_publicip</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-delete_publicip" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                                        <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                                                                                                                                                <li>no</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>yes</li>
                                                                                    </ul>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies whether to delete the EIP bound to the ECS when deleting the ECS.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-delete_volume"></div>
                    <b>delete_volume</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-delete_volume" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                                        <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                                                                                                                                                <li>no</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>yes</li>
                                                                                    </ul>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies whether to delete the data disks attached to the ECS when deleting the ECS.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-desire_instance_number"></div>
                    <b>desire_instance_number</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-desire_instance_number" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the expected number of instances. The default value is the minimum number of instances.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-enterprise_project_id"></div>
                    <b>enterprise_project_id</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-enterprise_project_id" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the enterprise project ID, which is used to specify the enterprise project       to which the AS group belongs.</div>
                                            <div>If the value is 0 or left blank, the AS group belongs to the default enterprise project.</div>
                                            <div>If the value is a UUID, the AS group belongs to the enterprise project corresponding to the UUID.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-health_periodic_audit_grace_period"></div>
                    <b>health_periodic_audit_grace_period</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-health_periodic_audit_grace_period" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the grace period for instance health check. The unit is second and value range is 0-86400.       The default value is 600. The health check grace period starts after an instance is added        to an AS group and is enabled.        The AS group will start checking the instance status only after the grace period ends.</div>
                                            <div>This parameter is valid only when the instance health check method of the AS group is ELB_AUDIT.</div>
                                            <div>Default is 600.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-health_periodic_audit_method"></div>
                    <b>health_periodic_audit_method</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-health_periodic_audit_method" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                            <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                                                                                                                                                <li>elb_audit</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>nova_audit</li>
                                                                                    </ul>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the health check method for instances in the AS group. When load balancing is configured for       an AS group, the default value is ELB_AUDIT. Otherwise, the default value is NOVA_AUDIT.</div>
                                            <div>ELB_AUDIT indicates the ELB health check, which takes effect in an AS group with a listener.</div>
                                            <div>NOVA_AUDIT indicates the ECS health check, which is the health check method delivered with AS.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-health_periodic_audit_time"></div>
                    <b>health_periodic_audit_time</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-health_periodic_audit_time" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the instance health check period.  The value can be 1, 5, 15, 60, or 180 in the unit of minutes.</div>
                                            <div>If this parameter is not specified, the default value is 5.</div>
                                            <div>If the value is set to 0, health check is performed every 10 seconds.</div>
                                            <div>Default is 5.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-instance_terminate_policy"></div>
                    <b>instance_terminate_policy</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-instance_terminate_policy" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                            <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                                                                                                                                                <li>old_config_old_instance</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>old_config_new_instance</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>old_instance</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>new_instance</li>
                                                                                    </ul>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the instance removal policy.</div>
                                            <div>OLD_CONFIG_OLD_INSTANCE (default). The earlier-created instances based on the earlier-created       AS configurations are removed first.</div>
                                            <div>OLD_CONFIG_NEW_INSTANCE. The later-created instances based on the earlier-created       AS configurations are removed first.</div>
                                            <div>OLD_INSTANCE. The earlier-created instances are removed first.</div>
                                            <div>NEW_INSTANCE. The later-created instances are removed first.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-interface"></div>
                    <b>interface</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-interface" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                            <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                                                                                                                                                <li>admin</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>internal</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li><div style="color: blue"><b>public</b>&nbsp;&larr;</div></li>
                                                                                    </ul>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Endpoint URL type to fetch from the service catalog.</div>
                                                                <div style="font-size: small; color: darkgreen"><br/>aliases: endpoint_type</div>
                                    </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-lb_listener"></div>
                    <b>lb_listener</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-lb_listener" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies ID or name of a classic load balancer listener. The system supports the binding of up       to six load balancer listeners, the IDs of which are separated using a comma (,).</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory when &#x27;lbaas_listeners&#x27; is not specified.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-lbaas_listeners"></div>
                    <b>lbaas_listeners</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-lbaas_listeners" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                         / <span style="color: purple">elements=dictionary</span>                                            </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies information about an enhanced load balancer.</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory when &#x27;lb_listener&#x27; is not specified.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                                    <td class="elbow-placeholder"></td>
                                                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-lbaas_listeners/pool_id"></div>
                    <b>pool_id</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-lbaas_listeners/pool_id" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                 / <span style="color: red">required</span>                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the backend ECS group ID.</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                    <td class="elbow-placeholder"></td>
                                                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-lbaas_listeners/protocol_port"></div>
                    <b>protocol_port</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-lbaas_listeners/protocol_port" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                 / <span style="color: red">required</span>                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the backend protocol ID, which is the port on which            a backend ECS listens for traffic. The port ID ranges from 1 to 65535.</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                    <td class="elbow-placeholder"></td>
                                                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-lbaas_listeners/weight"></div>
                    <b>weight</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-lbaas_listeners/weight" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                 / <span style="color: red">required</span>                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the weight, which determines the portion        of requests a backend ECS processes when being compared to other         backend ECSs added to the same listener.</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                    
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-max_instance_number"></div>
                    <b>max_instance_number</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-max_instance_number" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the maximum number of instances. The default value is 0.</div>
                                            <div>Default is 0.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-min_instance_number"></div>
                    <b>min_instance_number</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-min_instance_number" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the minimum number of instances. The default value is 0.</div>
                                            <div>Default is 0.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-multi_az_priority_policy"></div>
                    <b>multi_az_priority_policy</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-multi_az_priority_policy" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                            <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                                                                                                                                                <li>equilibrium_distribute</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>pick_first</li>
                                                                                    </ul>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the priority policy used to select target AZs when adjusting the number of instances in an AS group.</div>
                                            <div>EQUILIBRIUM_DISTRIBUTE (default). When adjusting the number of instances, ensure that instances in each AZ in       the available_zones list is evenly distributed. If instances cannot be added in the target AZ, select another AZ       based on the PICK_FIRST policy.</div>
                                            <div>PICK_FIRST. When adjusting the number of instances, target AZs are determined in the order       in the available_zones list.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-networks"></div>
                    <b>networks</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-networks" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                         / <span style="color: purple">elements=dictionary</span>                                            </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies network information. The system supports up to five subnets. The first subnet transferred       serves as the primary NIC of the ECS by default.</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory for creation of autoscaling group.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                                    <td class="elbow-placeholder"></td>
                                                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-networks/id"></div>
                    <b>id</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-networks/id" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                 / <span style="color: red">required</span>                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the network ID.</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                    
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-notifications"></div>
                    <b>notifications</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-notifications" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                         / <span style="color: purple">elements=string</span>                                            </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the notification mode.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-region_name"></div>
                    <b>region_name</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-region_name" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Name of the region.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-router"></div>
                    <b>router</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-router" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>The router ID or name.</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory for creating resource.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-scaling_configuration"></div>
                    <b>scaling_configuration</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-scaling_configuration" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>The AS configuration ID or name.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-scaling_group_id"></div>
                    <b>scaling_group_id</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-scaling_group_id" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>ID the AS group.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-scaling_group_name"></div>
                    <b>scaling_group_name</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-scaling_group_name" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Name of the AS group.</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory for creating autoscaling group.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-security_groups"></div>
                    <b>security_groups</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-security_groups" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">list</span>
                         / <span style="color: purple">elements=dictionary</span>                                            </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the security group. If the security group is specified both in the AS configuration and AS group,       the security group specified in the AS configuration prevails.</div>
                                            <div>If the security group is not specified in either of them, the default security group is used.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                                    <td class="elbow-placeholder"></td>
                                                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-security_groups/id"></div>
                    <b>id</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-security_groups/id" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                 / <span style="color: red">required</span>                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the security group ID.</div>
                                            <div>Mandatory.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                    
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-state"></div>
                    <b>state</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-state" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                            <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                                                                                                                                                <li><div style="color: blue"><b>present</b>&nbsp;&larr;</div></li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>absent</li>
                                                                                    </ul>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Whether resource should be present or absent.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-timeout"></div>
                    <b>timeout</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-timeout" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">integer</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                                    <b>Default:</b><br/><div style="color: blue">180</div>
                                    </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>How long should ansible wait for the requested resource.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-validate_certs"></div>
                    <b>validate_certs</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-validate_certs" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                                                                                                                                                <li><div style="color: blue"><b>no</b>&nbsp;&larr;</div></li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li>yes</li>
                                                                                    </ul>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Whether or not SSL API requests should be verified.</div>
                                            <div>Before Ansible 2.3 this defaulted to <code>yes</code>.</div>
                                                                <div style="font-size: small; color: darkgreen"><br/>aliases: verify</div>
                                    </td>
            </tr>
                                <tr>
                                                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="parameter-wait"></div>
                    <b>wait</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#parameter-wait" title="Permalink to this option"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                        <span style="color: purple">boolean</span>
                                                                    </div>
                                                        </td>
                                <td>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <ul style="margin: 0; padding: 0"><b>Choices:</b>
                                                                                                                                                                <li>no</li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                <li><div style="color: blue"><b>yes</b>&nbsp;&larr;</div></li>
                                                                                    </ul>
                                                                            </td>
                                                                <td>
                                            <div>Should ansible wait until the requested resource is complete.</div>
                                                        </td>
            </tr>
                        </table>
    <br/>

.. Notes

Notes
-----

.. note::
   - The standard OpenStack environment variables, such as ``OS_USERNAME`` may be used instead of providing explicit values.
   - Auth information is driven by openstacksdk, which means that values can come from a yaml config file in /etc/ansible/openstack.yaml, /etc/openstack/clouds.yaml or ~/.config/openstack/clouds.yaml, then from standard environment variables, then finally by explicit parameters in plays. More information can be found at https://docs.openstack.org/openstacksdk/

.. Seealso


.. Examples

Examples
--------

.. code-block:: yaml+jinja

    
    opentelekomcloud.cloud.as_group:
      scaling_group_name: "scaling-group-test"
      networks:
        - id: "39007a7e-ee4f-4d13-8283-b4da2e037c69"
      router: "65707a7e-ee4f-4d13-8283-b4da2e037c69"
    register: as_group




.. Facts


.. Return values

Return Values
-------------
Common return values are documented :ref:`here <common_return_values>`, the following are the fields unique to this module:

.. raw:: html

    <table border=0 cellpadding=0 class="documentation-table">
        <tr>
            <th colspan="2">Key</th>
            <th>Returned</th>
            <th width="100%">Description</th>
        </tr>
                    <tr>
                                <td colspan="2">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-as_group"></div>
                    <b>as_group</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-as_group" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">complex</span>
                                          </div>
                                    </td>
                <td>On Success.</td>
                <td>
                                            <div>AS groups object.</div>
                                        <br/>
                                    </td>
            </tr>
                                        <tr>
                                    <td class="elbow-placeholder">&nbsp;</td>
                                <td colspan="1">
                    <div class="ansibleOptionAnchor" id="return-as_group/scaling_group_id"></div>
                    <b>scaling_group_id</b>
                    <a class="ansibleOptionLink" href="#return-as_group/scaling_group_id" title="Permalink to this return value"></a>
                    <div style="font-size: small">
                      <span style="color: purple">string</span>
                                          </div>
                                    </td>
                <td>success</td>
                <td>
                                            <div>Specifies the AS group ID.</div>
                                        <br/>
                                            <div style="font-size: smaller"><b>Sample:</b></div>
                                                <div style="font-size: smaller; color: blue; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all;">39007a7e-ee4f-4d13-8283-b4da2e037c69</div>
                                    </td>
            </tr>
                    
                        </table>
    <br/><br/>

..  Status (Presently only deprecated)
